name: Console Farmer v.1
description:
Little Console-Game,  where you can build, upgrade and gain ressources.

Showcase: 

Available Buildings:

  • Factory: produces ressources over time
  • Booster: boosts building nearby
  • Spawner: spawns ressources around the building
  • Bank: gain interest from your current holding ressources

Available Commands:

  • Build command: "build <buildingName>"
  • Upgrade: stand on building and type "upgrade"
  • Delete: destroys building "delete"
  • Statistics: "stats"
  • Quests: "quests"
  • Saving: "save"
  • Exit: "exit"
  • Help: shows every command "help"
